title: Get Used to It!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Nico-chan, this is......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re so used to spoiling others that you’re not used to being spoiled yourself, so I thought I’d help you get used to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Huh? Is that so? Why......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Don’t worry about the details. Eat as much as you want, and don’t worry about anyone else! Nico made all of these for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>But you’ve made so many that I don’t even know which ones I should eat~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Just eat whatever you like!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Whatever I like...... Hmm, that’s hard. All of them look super delicious! Nico-chan, tell me what you recommend!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>If that’s the case, then eat this one. Then, that one. That one also, it’s one of the best ones.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Okay, Nico-chan, open wide~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No, don’t do that! Emma, just eat it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
